body: Why everyone assume that people that hate ntr are vanilla fans? From how I see it those are not true vanilla fans if they can't understand that good vanilla is made in a reliable set up, that means in a world where ntr is possible, isolated vanilla stories are boring because the male is never forced to be a good partner and everything goes well for them at the end. Like that vanilla of guy that knew his girfriend never came during sex and then went to talk to her about it and fix it... Damn that was good. NTR only depicts a situation that escalate because of the cuck mistake that is not paying enough attention to his partner. I like to see some ntr like actual vanilla, the ntr guy is in fact saving the woman from a guy who does not care about her. Is the same reason of why no matter what kind of doujin they make about Komi in a ntr situation it will always feel forced, because Tadano is there to understan her, while every ntr doujin about Amano Megumi is gonna feel natural XD

All vanilla people who write "kill all cucks" or hates NTR/Cuckold etch, are either already a cuck or contradicting
themselves. Because fapping to porn or hentai, you are actually imagining being
the guy/girl fucking their partner or wanting to fuck that person/thing/it etc. See it like this, imagine yourself
standing in a hentai or porn and watching them having sexual intercourse while you beating your meat, that's pretty
much what a cuck is, but just digital(through a screen).

At least we embraces being a cuck rather trying to cover in fear of being one which we already are.
We are the neutral hardcore cucks while you guys are the softcore cucks.
This is the hard and bitter truth that you people can't understand.
